nodes.text: Bellus Tan was a male individual who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Bellus Tan was the son of a shipping magnate from the Tapani sector. After falling out with his father, he wandered the galaxy, trying to make a good name for himself, in an attempt to and gain his father's forgiveness. He began running goods through the Thaereian system and during the time of the Clone Wars, he encountered the Heroes of Cularin on T-4, the fourth planet in the system.
